data.title: French pole vaulter receives $250,000 adult content offer
data.meta_description: Anthony Ammirati went viral after incident during his Olympics routine where his genitals made contact with crossbar, leading to his disqualification
data.text:
An adult film website called CamSoda offered French pole vaulter Anthony Ammirati a $250,000 for an explicit webcam show.

Ammirati went viral after an incident during his Olympics routine where his genitals made contact with the crossbar, leading to his disqualification from the competition.

The athlete acknowledged a deficiency in his pole vault technique and expressed disappointment over his disqualification.

Ammirati's Instagram following increased from 8,400 to more than 171,000 after the incident.

He finished 15th at the Games with a best vault of 5.60 meters, having won the U20 World Championships two years ago.

The French sports academy, Envol, expressed pride in Ammirati hoping the Olympic experience would remain a valuable memory for him.

Ammirati has not confirmed whether he will accept the job offer from the adult entertainment company.

This article was written in collaboration with Generative AI news company Alchemiq

Sources: FOX News, Economic Times, Deccan Herald, Tribunnews, Liputan6, Wake Up Singapore, Must Share News, Jacaranda FM, Hindustan Times, Marca, Telecom Asia, Baller Alert, Socialite Life, Sports Casting, Distractify, Daily Mail.
